Client.Name: Shandong Chilong Film & Culture Media Co., Ltd.

Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Shandong Chilong Film & Culture Media Co., Ltd. is a media organization primarily engaged in the planning and production of cultural and film products, as well as film and television talent training. Additionally, the company conducts international cultural and artistic exchanges, organizes large-scale cultural events, produces and distributes radio and television programs, and develops cultural and educational software. The company has gathered high-level professionals from home and abroad in the fields of culture, arts, film and television, and information technology, forming a highly qualified team of experts.

In 2016, the company completed the production of the public welfare web film "A Piece of Bright Red Cloth," which won the Top Ten Supporting Actor Award at the China Golden Kite International Microfilm Festival. The microfilm "My Third Grandmother" received the Silver Award at the Wuhan Microfilm Competition and was shortlisted for the San Francisco International New Concept Film Festival. The company's film and television works have repeatedly won Special Gold Awards, Gold Awards, First Prizes, Second Prizes, and Fine Project Awards in domestic film and television competitions.

The company established the "Mount Tai Film and Television Training Base," where renowned domestic directors, planners, and post-production experts provide instruction. Using major film and television projects to drive practical, hands-on teaching, the base adopts a novel teaching model to improve the modern film and television "production, education, and research" training and educational development industry chain. This ensures that every trainee gains knowledge, masters skills, and applies what they have learned, striving to establish the Mount Tai brand as a premier film and television training institution.

Recently, the company has launched a major online series on traditional Chinese culture titled "Explaining Great Chinese Culture in Plain Language," the project "Dragon of Chinese Characters" focusing on Chinese character learning, education, and inheritance in the information age, the web series "Young Mount Tai," and the large-scale series "Discussions on Mount Tai." These initiatives aim to promote and inherit China's outstanding traditional culture, providing an excellent cultural practice platform for all sectors of society.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset:
Filecoin storage providers typically use tools such as Boost, Lotus, and Singularity to prepare and process data prior to onboarding it onto the blockchain.
Boost handles efficient data ingestion and market transaction management, while Lotus manages storage deals and interacts with the Filecoin blockchain.
For large-scale or high-performance scenarios, Singularity can significantly accelerate the data sealing process.
After data is divided into sectors, it undergoes initial verification via zero-knowledge proofs and must continuously submit PoSt (Proofs of Spacetime) to ensure ongoing storage integrity.
Finally, sectors that pass all verification steps are submitted to the Filecoin network, completing the entire data storage workflow.
